subObjectives.description: want to test the MQTT broker url http://abc-mq-company.com with port 1883 and 1884. generate multiple test case for this.
subObjectives.instructions: Ask for help testing MQTT broker connectivity at http://abc-mq-company.com using ports 1883 and 1884. Request multiple test cases for different scenarios including basic connectivity tests, port availability checks, and connection validation methods.

subObjectives.description: want to test the message publish to MQTT broker url http://abc-mq-company.com with port 1883 and 1884. message to publish-> { topic : mymsg message: "hello, this is my first msg to publish" QOS: 0 } generate multiple test case to test the real scenarios like, by giving only message and qos value. another one will be for sending request with only topic and message, next will be with only topic and qos.
subObjectives.instructions: Request help with MQTT message publishing tests to http://abc-mq-company.com. Ask for test cases covering: 1) Publishing with only message and QOS values, 2) Publishing with only topic and message, 3) Publishing with only topic and QOS. Expect comprehensive guidance on different publishing scenarios and parameter combinations.

subObjectives.description: want to test the message subscribe to MQTT broker url http://abc-mq-company.com with port 1883 and topic : mymsg message to subscribe-> { rc < get the actual message printed here from the topic } generate multiple test case to test the real scenarios.
subObjectives.instructions: Ask for help with MQTT message subscription testing to http://abc-mq-company.com with topic 'mymsg'. Request multiple test scenarios for subscription functionality including receiving messages, handling different message formats, and verifying subscription confirmation.
